name: cliffy
description: WASM-first reactive framework with classical FRP semantics and geometric algebra foundation

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:release: wasm-pack build cliffy-wasm --target web --release --out-dir ../cliffy-typescript/pkg && cd cliffy-typescript && npx tsc
scripts.dev:wasm: cargo watch -w cliffy-core -w cliffy-wasm -s 'wasm-pack build cliffy-wasm --target web --out-dir ../cliffy-typescript/pkg --dev'
scripts.dev:counter: concurrently -k -n wasm,vite -c blue,green "npm run dev:wasm" "cd examples/counter-101 && npm run dev"
scripts.clean: cargo clean && rm -rf cliffy-typescript/dist cliffy-typescript/pkg examples/*/dist examples/*/node_modules/.vite

author: Cliffy Team
